definition: (Internet slang) (wryly jocular) poverty limits my power of imagination/(fig.) flabbergasted by the antics of the wealthy/the rich live in another world/(abbr. for 貧窮限制了我的想象力|贫穷限制了我的想象力[pin2 qiong2 xian4 zhi4 le5 wo3 de5 xiang3 xiang4 li4])
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
